If the cape is out of range (beyond 100 feet, typically) or there's not enough open space for the eidolon to manifest, your attempt to Manifest your Eidolon fails.

ActivateF envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast a summoner link spell. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

Craft Requirements You are a summoner.

Elder Seed.name: Elder Seed
Elder Seed.description:
Activate 1 Interact

An enormous, perfect, ripe seed from a tree important to a region's druids, an elder seed exudes vitality. Plant life grows quickly and abundantly around it. Anyone who touches the seed understands the nature of its power. Swallowing it whole imparts its effects, but succeeding at the save against the boon causes the swallower to regurgitate the seed.

Stage 1 (9 Days) Your skin hardens, giving you a brownish-green tinge. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage and piercing damage equal to your level, and you have tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet. Also, you can cast enlarge, speak with animals, speak with plants, and web each once per day as primal innate spells. The web is a dense mycelial net rather than spider silk.

Stage 2 (1 Month) You gain low-light vision and fluency in Arboreal. However, your body feels stiffer, your mind slower to move to intense emotions, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} to take your time making decisions. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, take a –1 status penalty to initiative rolls, and gain a weakness to fire damage equal to half your level, and you take the same amount of additional damage from axes. If you die at this stage or higher, your body sinks into the earth, forming rich soil. Over several days, a mature, full-sized tree of the seed's type grows where you fell. If plant growth is impossible, such as due to lack of sunlight, fungi grow there instead, extending mycelia through the earth until they reach a place the tree can grow. Then, the tree grows. An arboreal can tend this tree to cause it to regrow one elder seed after 3 years and 3 days.

Stage 3 (1 Month) You become more treelike and ponderous in body and mind, and when you cast the enlarge innate spell from this boon, you can cast it at 4th level. The clumsy value increases to 2 and the status penalty increases to –2. Whenever you roll initiative, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} automatically, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} if the d20 roll is 10 or lower, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 3} if the d20 shows a 1. Your weakness to fire and vulnerability to axes equals your level.

Stage 4 You die.

Purging You must seek out an arboreal, druid, or nature-loving fey that is your level or higher whom you have never met, and pledge your allegiance to that being. Doing so places you under a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Q690d3mw3TUrKX7E]{Geas} to accomplish at least one meaningful service, usually a quest, for your new liege. While under the geas, you can't advance to stage 4. Once you complete your service, you regurgitate the elder seed, and its effects on you end.

Elder Sign.name: Elder Sign
Elder Sign.description:
This stone tablet is carved with the symbol of a five-branched twig. There are only a limited number of elder signs, and each time one is destroyed, the universe's doom creeps inexorably closer. Reciting one of three different occult mantras (@Check[type:occultism|dc:20|name:Recite Occult Mantra] check to do so correctly) allows three different activations. All three abilities work only on a creature connected to the Elder Mythos or a cosmic horror, such as a wendigo or gug; the activations refer to them as "eldritch creatures."

Activate D command, envision, Interact

Effect The elder sign casts a 10th-level banishment spell on an eldritch creature. Even if the creature isn't extraplanar, the elder sign can still banish it, sending it back to the part of the Material Plane from which it originated. If the creature is a Great Old One, the elder sign banishes it automatically (as if it critically failed its save) but is then forever destroyed.

Activate D command, envision, Interact

Effect The elder sign casts dispel magic on an effect from an eldritch creature, using a counteract level of 10 and +30 modifier for the roll.

Activate D command, envision, Interact

Effect The elder sign casts dimensional lock, though it wards against travel by only eldritch creatures. Each time the elder sign casts dimensional lock in this way, the previous dimensional lock spell ends.

Destruction The only way to destroy an elder sign is to use it to banish a Great Old One.

Eldritch Flare.name: Eldritch Flare
Eldritch Flare.description:
Activate 2 Interact

This poison draws power from the magic of its victim. If a creature under the effects of eldritch flare Casts a Spell, excess magical energy feeds back into the toxin, increasing the DC of the poison by 2 that round. In addition, if the spell deals damage, the poison deals half its damage as one of the types of damage the spell deals (the other half remains poison damage). If the target is immune or has resistance to the spell's damage, the poison deals half its damage as mental damage instead. If the victim casts no spells during a round while affected, the poison still deals its poison damage.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 4d6[poison],4d6[fire]]] (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 5d6[poison],5d6[fire]]] (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 6d6[poison],6d6[fire]]] damage (1 round)

Note: the inline rolls have been set to half fire damage as a default

Electric Eelskin.name: Electric Eelskin
Electric Eelskin.description:
Shining, slippery eelskin covers the plates of this +1 resilient greater slick leather armor. The armor gives you the ability to breathe water and grants you a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and Stealth checks you attempt in the water.

ActivateDCommand, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You cast a 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} with a spell attack modifier of [[/r 1d20+19]]{+19}.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of shocking grasp.

Electrocable.name: Electrocable
Electrocable.description: This footlong length of conductive cable is capped on both ends by grounded handles containing Stasian coils. These coils can be turned on or off as a single action. While on, the coils electrify the cable, dealing [[/r 1d6[electricity]]] and [[/r 1d6[fire]]] damage in a thin precise line to anything the cable touches, though the cable is too unwieldy to use as a weapon. Electrocables are typically used to "cut" a thin straight line through metal. They ignore 10 points of a metal object's hardness.

Electromuscular Stimulator.name: Electromuscular Stimulator
Electromuscular Stimulator.description:
Activated Interact

This rare gadget uses Stasian technology to grant someone a burst of activity, though its use can be painful. The electromuscular stimulator must be carefully attached to you, requiring 1 minute to do so. You can attach an electromuscular stimulator to yourself. When you Activate an attached electromuscular stimulator, roll a Crafting check, using the Crafting modifier of the creature who attached the stimulator to you, with a DC equal to the standard DC for your level. The effects of the activation depend on the result of the Crafting check.

Critical Success You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition for 1 minute and can use the extra action each round only to Stride or Strike.

Success As critical success, but you also take [[/r 3[persistent,electricity]]] damage.

Failure You gain the quickened condition for 2 rounds and can use the extra action each round only to Stride or Strike. You take [[/r 3[persistent,electricity]]] damage.

Critical Failure You take [[/r 2d6[electricity]]] damage and [[/r 3[persistent,electricity]]] damage.

Elemental Ammunition (Greater).name: Elemental Ammunition (Greater)
Elemental Ammunition (Greater).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

When activated, the reservoir of alchemical reagents in elemental ammunition atomizes on impact, dealing [[/r 3d4[persistent,damageType]]] acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage to the target and [[/r (3[splash])[damageType]]]{3 splash damage} in addition to the damage the attack normally deals. Each damage type requires a different formula, and the ammunition gains a trait matching the damage type.

Elemental Ammunition (Lesser).name: Elemental Ammunition (Lesser)
Elemental Ammunition (Lesser).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

When activated, the reservoir of alchemical reagents in elemental ammunition atomizes on impact, dealing [[/r 1[persistent,damageType]]] acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage to the target and [[/r (1[splash])[damageType]]]{1 splash damage} in addition to the damage the attack normally deals. Each damage type requires a different formula, and the ammunition gains a trait matching the damage type.

Elemental Ammunition (Moderate).name: Elemental Ammunition (Moderate)
Elemental Ammunition (Moderate).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

When activated, the reservoir of alchemical reagents in elemental ammunition atomizes on impact, dealing [[/r 2d4[persistent,damageType]]] acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage to the target and [[/r (2[splash])[damageType]]]{2 splash damage} in addition to the damage the attack normally deals. Each damage type requires a different formula, and the ammunition gains a trait matching the damage type.

Elemental Gem.name: Elemental Gem
Elemental Gem.description:
Activate D Command, Interact

You shout the name of an elemental lord and dash this glassy gem against a hard surface to activate it. It cracks open, casting a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.lpT6LotUaQPfinjj]{Summon Elemental} spell to summon forth an elemental you control as long as you spend an action each round to Sustain the Activation.

This gem comes in four varieties: transparent for a living whirlwind, light brown for a living landslide, reddish orange for a living wildfire, and blue-green for a living waterfall.

Elemental Wayfinder (Air).name: Elemental Wayfinder (Air)
Elemental Wayfinder (Air).description:
Pathfinder Society researchers recently created elemental wayfinders with the assistance of the Society's elemental allies. In addition to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, these wayfinders each grant the ability to cast a particular elemental spell once per day, and can assist Pathfinders in exploring areas associated with their element. Each has the trait associated with its element.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The wayfinder can cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}.

Additionally, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} as a primal innate spell once every 10 minutes.

Elemental Wayfinder (Earth).name: Elemental Wayfinder (Earth)
Elemental Wayfinder (Earth).description:
Pathfinder Society researchers recently created elemental wayfinders with the assistance of the Society's elemental allies. In addition to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, these wayfinders each grant the ability to cast a particular elemental spell once per day, and can assist Pathfinders in exploring areas associated with their element. Each has the trait associated with its element.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The wayfinder can cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin}.

Additionally, you can dig twice as quickly as normal.

Elemental Wayfinder (Fire).name: Elemental Wayfinder (Fire)
Elemental Wayfinder (Fire).description:
Pathfinder Society researchers recently created elemental wayfinders with the assistance of the Society's elemental allies. In addition to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, these wayfinders each grant the ability to cast a particular elemental spell once per day, and can assist Pathfinders in exploring areas associated with their element. Each has the trait associated with its element.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The wayfinder can cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}.

Additionally, you gain resistance 5 to fire.

Elemental Wayfinder (Water).name: Elemental Wayfinder (Water)
Elemental Wayfinder (Water).description:
Pathfinder Society researchers recently created elemental wayfinders with the assistance of the Society's elemental allies. In addition to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, these wayfinders each grant the ability to cast a particular elemental spell once per day, and can assist Pathfinders in exploring areas associated with their element. Each has the trait associated with its element.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect The wayfinder can cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Y3G6Y6EDgCY0s3fq]{Hydraulic Torrent}.

Additionally, you gain the constent effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}.

Elixir of Life (Greater).name: Elixir of Life (Greater)
Elixir of Life (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature''s natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (7d6+18)[healing]]]{7d6+18 Hit Points} and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Z9oPh462q82IYIZ6]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater)}

Elixir of Life (Lesser).name: Elixir of Life (Lesser)
Elixir of Life (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creatures natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (3d6+6)[healing]]]{3d6+6 Hit Points} and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.EpB7yJPEuG6ez4z3]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Lesser)}

Elixir of Life (Major).name: Elixir of Life (Major)
Elixir of Life (Major).description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (8d6+21)[healing]]]{8d6+21 Hit Points} and gain +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.PpLxndUSgzgs6dd0]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Major)}

Elixir of Life (Minor).name: Elixir of Life (Minor)
Elixir of Life (Minor).description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r 1d6[healing]]]{1d6 Hit Points} and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor)}

Elixir of Life (Moderate).name: Elixir of Life (Moderate)
Elixir of Life (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (5d6+12)[healing]]]{5d6+12 Hit Points} and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Yxssrnh9UZJAM0V7]{Effect: Elixir of Life (Moderate)}

Elixir of Life (True).name: Elixir of Life (True)
Elixir of Life (True).description:
Activate A

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (10d6+27)[healing]]]{10d6+27 Hit Points} and gain +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.9MeHc072G4L8AJkp]{Effect: Elixir of Life (True)}

Elixir of Rejuvenation.name: Elixir of Rejuvenation
Elixir of Rejuvenation.description:
Activate A Interact

The elixir of rejuvenation restores a creature to full health and eradicates toxins affecting it. When you drink this elixir, you're restored to your maximum Hit Points, and all afflictions of 20th level or lower affecting you are removed.

You can instead administer this elixir to a creature that has been dead for a week or less. When you do, that creature is instantly brought back to life with 1 Hit Point and no spell slots, Focus Points, or other daily resources.

Craft Requirements philosopher's stone, true elixir of life

Elven Absinthe.name: Elven Absinthe
Elven Absinthe.description:
Specialists in Kyonin prepare this emerald-green beverage.

Activate A Interact

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Onset 1 hour

Maximum Duration 1 day

Stage 1 +2 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks (1 hour)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 hour)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} (1 hour)

Elven Branched Spear.name: Elven Branched Spear
Elven Branched Spear.description: Several short branches project from this delicate spear's shaft, each angled forward and tipped with a leaflike blade.

Elven Chain (High-Grade).name: Elven Chain (High-Grade)
Elven Chain (High-Grade).description:
Elven chain is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.MPcM4Wt6KmWE2kGL]{Chain Shirt} made of mithral that glitters in even the faintest light. Because it's constructed with small, supple rings, it has no check penalty.

Created by elven artisans employing ancient crafting techniques, elven chain is exceptionally quiet. Unlike other chain shirts-even other mithral chain shirts-elven chain does not have the noisy trait. This suit of armor can be etched with runes like any other mithral chain shirt.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include mithral worth at least 26,000 gp

Elven Chain (Standard-Grade).name: Elven Chain (Standard-Grade)
Elven Chain (Standard-Grade).description:
Elven chain is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.MPcM4Wt6KmWE2kGL]{Chain Shirt} made of mithral that glitters in even the faintest light. Because it's constructed with small, supple rings, it has no check penalty.

Created by elven artisans employing ancient crafting techniques, elven chain is exceptionally quiet. Unlike other chain shirts-even other mithral chain shirts-elven chain does not have the noisy trait. This suit of armor can be etched with runes like any other mithral chain shirt.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include mithral worth at least 3,125 sp.

Elven Curve Blade.name: Elven Curve Blade
Elven Curve Blade.description: Essentially a longer version of the scimitar, this traditional elven weapon has a thinner blade than its cousin.

Elysian Dew.name: Elysian Dew
Elysian Dew.description:
Activate 1 Interact

When you drink sweet, sky-blue Elysian dew, for 1 minute, you gain a 10-foot aura that evokes the vitality of Elysium, causing nearby objects to seem more colorful and plants to stand taller. You and any ally that starts its turn in the emanation gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +1 item bonus to saving throws, and a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the start of your or the ally's next turn. If you're evil and drink this potion, it fails to work, and you must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save or the potion renders you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Ember Dust.name: Ember Dust
Ember Dust.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This handful of gritty black dust glows faintly, like old coals, but is cool to the touch. When ember dust is sprinkled upon the ground or a flat surface in an adjacent unoccupied square, the dust transforms into a bonfire that fills the majority of the square. For 8 hours, the bonfire blazes regardless of whether it has any fuel.

The fire doesn't harm the surface on which it was sprinkled, and it can't be extinguished except by fully dousing or submerging it in water, or by smothering it completely. Anything that's lit from the bonfire requires fuel to burn and can be quenched normally.

While it's safe enough to move through the space and edge around the bonfire, a creature remaining in the bonfire for at least a full round takes [[/r 1d6[fire]]] damage each round.

After 8 hours, the bonfire becomes a normal fire and continues burning only as conditions permit.

Emberheart.name: Emberheart
Emberheart.description:
This small, heart-shaped amulet appears to be sculpted from stone with a single streak of dim light running through, like an ember just beneath ashes. When worn, the amulet gives off a gentle warmth, akin to being near a fireplace. You gain poison resistance 15 when wearing this amulet.

When you invest the amulet, you either increase your Constitution score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

Activate 2 Interact (healing, magical, necromancy, positive)

Frequency once per day

You hold the amulet aloft as a ripple of warm orange light exudes outward. Each ally in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] regains [[/r 30[healing]]]{30 Hit Points} and gains a +3 status bonus to Fortitude saves until the end of their next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.J0YS8mQsQ1BmT6Xv]{Effect: Emberheart}

Emerald Fulcrum Lens.name: Emerald Fulcrum Lens
Emerald Fulcrum Lens.description:
This concave green lens is pitted and flawed; its jagged edges can cut those who don't handle it with care. While you have the Emerald Fulcrum Lens invested, your flesh appears waxen and pallid. You gain negative healing and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spells gain a +4 status bonus to the Hit Points they restore to you. You can also activate the lens in the following ways.

Activate 2 Interact (healing)

Frequency once per day

Effect You grasp the Emerald Fulcrum Lens in one hand, regain 30 Hit Points, and gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against magic for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.rH6RHxy6sNTLusKX]{Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Throw)}

Activate 2 Interact (attack, possession)

While grasping the lens, make a melee spell attack roll with a modifier of [[/r d20+20]]{+20}. On a hit, you force the splinter of Nhimbaloth's essence from the lens to possess the target. You're no longer invested in the lens, and the target gains the benefits as though it had invested the lens but can't activate the lens's other abilities. This effect is permanent, but it can be ended by any effect that removes a possession effect. The lens doesn't have any magical abilities until the possession effect ends; when it does, the essence returns to the lens.

Emerald Grasshopper.name: Emerald Grasshopper
Emerald Grasshopper.description:
Usage affixed to armor

Activate F Envision

Trigger You attempt a High Jump but haven't rolled yet

Requirements You're an expert in Athletics

This metal grasshopper studded with emeralds is usually clasped to the legs of a suit of armor.

When you activate it, if you succeed at the Athletics check, you Leap up to 50 feet vertically and up to 10 feet horizontally. If you critically succeed, you can Leap up to 75 feet vertically and 20 feet horizontally.

If you don't end your jump on solid ground, you flutter in the air until the end of your turn, then fall harmlessly at a rate of 60 feet per round until you reach the ground.

Emergency Disguise.name: Emergency Disguise
Emergency Disguise.description:
Usage affixed to armor

Activate 1 Envision

Requirements You're trained in Deception

In Woodsedge Lodge, this thin red ribbon, typically worn around the neck, symbolizes the reach of Galt's soul-trapping guillotines, the infamous final blades. Each of these talismans stores a specific disguise, chosen at the time of its creation. When activated, the talisman applies a disguise to its wearer, allowing them to Impersonate without taking the time to assemble a convincing disguise first. The components the disguise creates can appear to be worth up to 3 gp total.

The instant nature of the disguise leaves a few traces of its haphazard nature, imposing a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Impersonate using the disguise.

Wearers with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.e4KB4pSkx2lDBNw3]{Quick Disguise} feat don't take this penalty. Any objects created as a part of the disguise disappear after 24 hours or after you remove them.

Emergency Eye.name: Emergency Eye
Emergency Eye.description:
Activate f command

Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, or an effect otherwise impedes your vision

Requirements You are an expert in Perception.

This eye, harvested from a monster, looks like it's peacefully sleeping but gives you a backup when you can't use your eyes. When the eye is activated, the eyelid pops open, and the eye stares frantically about. You see through the eye with normal vision until the end of your next turn, when the eye withers and flakes away.

Emetic Paste (Greater).name: Emetic Paste (Greater)
Emetic Paste (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} creatures have difficulty swallowing, so you can Activate emetic paste by applying it to your skin or that of a sickened creature within reach, typically on the throat. The paste makes it easy for the sickened creature to purge, granting it an immediate Fortitude save to reduce its sickened condition. The paste grants the target a +4 item bonus to that save and to all saving throws to reduce the sickened condition for 1 hour.

Emetic Paste (Lesser).name: Emetic Paste (Lesser)
Emetic Paste (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Interact

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} creatures have difficulty swallowing, so you can Activate emetic paste by applying it to your skin or that of a sickened creature within reach, typically on the throat. The paste makes it easy for the sickened creature to purge, granting it an immediate Fortitude save to reduce its sickened condition. The paste grants the target a +2 item bonus to that save and to all saving throws to reduce the sickened condition for 1 hour.

Emetic Paste (Moderate).name: Emetic Paste (Moderate)
Emetic Paste (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} creatures have difficulty swallowing, so you can Activate emetic paste by applying it to your skin or that of a sickened creature within reach, typically on the throat. The paste makes it easy for the sickened creature to purge, granting it an immediate Fortitude save to reduce its sickened condition. The paste grants the target a +3 item bonus to that save and to all saving throws to reduce the sickened condition for 1 hour.

Empath's Cordial.name: Empath's Cordial
Empath's Cordial.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The pale liquid of empath's cordial changes color to reflect the mood of the creature nearest to it—turning blue for calm, red for anger, and green for envious, among other hues. For 1 hour after you drink this potion, you can sense the presence of general emotions, such as hostility toward you or the presence of an emotion effect impacting a creature's emotions, within 30 feet. A creature that failed a saving throw against calm emotions can't be detected. This potion doesn't allow you to automatically tell what emotions a specific creature is experiencing, but you can attempt a Perception check with a +2 item bonus (DC set by the GM) to discern that information. The potion also grants you a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} against creatures whose emotions you can sense.

Empathic Cords.name: Empathic Cords
Empathic Cords.description:
These intricately braided lengths of leather, twine, and ribbon can be worn around the neck. Empathic cords function only with the other cord in their pair and must be crafted together. If one cord becomes broken, the other dissolves in to non-magical dust. The price listed above is for a pair of cords. The creatures wearing a pair of empathic cords can sense each other's feelings and communicate empathically, no matter how far away they are, as long as the creatures are on the same planet.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLzFcIaSXs7YTIqJ]{Message}, targeting the creature wearing the matching cord. The range of this message is planetary.

Empathy Charm.name: Empathy Charm
Empathy Charm.description:
This charm, usually placed on an animal companion's collar, contains a single strand of your hair, as well as one of your animal companion's, creating a link that better transmits emotional cues to a trained psychological assistance animal.

ActivateR envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You attempt a saving throw against an emotion effect

Requirements Your animal companion wearing the empathy charm is within 10 feet

Effect Your animal companion senses the effect and attempts to calm you. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus against the triggering save.

Encompassing Lockpick.name: Encompassing Lockpick
Encompassing Lockpick.description: This lockpick houses a small compartment containing many smaller picks and other miniature tools. The lockpick itself is surprisingly malleable, belying the components within. An almost-impossible number of other tools are hidden in the compartment, including an entire set of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{Infiltrator Thieves' Tools} and any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.BznmPaRjI4Orb0IH]{Replacement Picks (Infiltrator Picks)}, an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.YhkomhtKBK3i9C7Q]{Elite Disguise Kit} and any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.IRqbsE8MgGLTfHLz]{Replacement Cosmetics (Elite)}, and an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TWv2EeDJaCjtmGUN]{Extreme Climber's Kit}, all while still somehow remaining only light Bulk. This makes the encompassing lockpick a favorite discreet option for rogues infiltrating high society events, as formal wear generally has few pockets and only allows a character to wear a single tool kit of light Bulk.

Endless Grimoire.name: Endless Grimoire
Endless Grimoire.description: When opened, this grimoire has unlimited pages that, oddly, seem almost eager to transcribe spells. Unlike most grimoires, it has no limits to its number of spells. The grimoire's eagerness to contain your spells grants you a +1 item bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn a Spell} if you do so by transcribing the spell into the grimoire. If you use the grimoire during your daily preparations and are capable of preparing spells of the appropriate level, the grimoire's nature leaks into your mind, allowing you to prepare an additional 1st-level spell.

Endless Grimoire (Greater).name: Endless Grimoire (Greater)
Endless Grimoire (Greater).description: When opened, this grimoire has unlimited pages that, oddly, seem almost eager to transcribe spells. Unlike most grimoires, it has no limits to its number of spells. The grimoire's eagerness to contain your spells grants you a +2 item bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn a Spell} if you do so by transcribing the spell into the grimoire. If you use the grimoire during your daily preparations and are capable of preparing spells of the appropriate level, the grimoire's nature leaks into your mind, allowing you to prepare an additional 3rd-level spell.

Endless Grimoire (Major).name: Endless Grimoire (Major)
Endless Grimoire (Major).description: When opened, this grimoire has unlimited pages that, oddly, seem almost eager to transcribe spells. Unlike most grimoires, it has no limits to its number of spells. The grimoire's eagerness to contain your spells grants you a +2 item bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn a Spell} if you do so by transcribing the spell into the grimoire. If you use the grimoire during your daily preparations and are capable of preparing spells of the appropriate level, the grimoire's nature leaks into your mind, allowing you to prepare an additional 5th-level spell.

Endless Grimoire (True).name: Endless Grimoire (True)
Endless Grimoire (True).description: When opened, this grimoire has unlimited pages that, oddly, seem almost eager to transcribe spells. Unlike most grimoires, it has no limits to its number of spells. The grimoire's eagerness to contain your spells grants you a +3 item bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{Learn a Spell} if you do so by transcribing the spell into the grimoire. If you use the grimoire during your daily preparations and are capable of preparing spells of the appropriate level, the grimoire's nature leaks into your mind, allowing you to prepare an additional 7th-level spell.

Energized Cartridge.name: Energized Cartridge
Energized Cartridge.description:
Usage affixed to a firearm or crossbow

Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt an attack roll with the affixed firearm or crossbow

Requirements You're trained in use of the affixed firearm or crossbow.

This simple brass shell casing contains trace amounts of alchemical ingredients and is usually attached to the underside of the affixed weapon's barrel. When activated, it causes the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transform into your choice of acid, cold, electricity, or fire, dealing damage of the appropriate energy type instead of its usual damage as well as 1d6 persistent damage of the same type on a critical hit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.vKooOkXHvtqCgZYg]{Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.tLGzSCcfxflLSqzw]{Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.eNVSBXuOiAaN152C]{Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.LH0IDLLF4RsT3KvM]{Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire)}

Energizing.name: Energizing
Energizing.description:
A weapon with this rune can absorb energy damage to empower it.

Activate r envision

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage

Effect The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 damage of the triggering type until the end of your next turn. As normal, if you use this reaction again during the duration, the damage doesn't combine; instead, change the 1d8 damage to the new triggering type of damage and change the duration to the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.ClsVhp5baFRjZQ23]{Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.68xcDyxsNgD3JddD]{Effect: Energizing Rune (Cold)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.9BsFdrEc7hkPWgSd]{Effect: Energizing Rune (Electricity)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.ascxqSlMEN9R6OOy]{Effect: Energizing Rune (Fire)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.4RnEUeYEzC919GZR]{Effect: Energizing Rune (Sonic)}

Energizing Lattice.name: Energizing Lattice
Energizing Lattice.description:
This suit of +2 resilient fortification lattice armor has latticework of fine golden wire. After negating a critical hit with its fortification rune, the latticework glows for 1 minute, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). You can Dismiss this light.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.cOcHWeogJFIkEI0d]{Effect: Energizing Lattice}

Activate 2 envision (force)

Requirements The energizing lattice is glowing because it negated an enemy's critical hit

Effect You release the lattice's energy and make a weapon or unarmed attack Strike that deals [[/r 6d6[force]]]{6d6 additional force damage}. If your Strike fails, but doesn't critically fail, the target still takes half the force damage. The latticework ceases glowing after the Strike.

Energizing Treat.name: Energizing Treat
Energizing Treat.description:
Activate 1 Interact

An energizing treat is a treat made from meat or grains. When you feed your animal companion or familiar an energizing treat, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute. It can use the extra action each round only for Strike, Stride, and Support actions, and it can do so only if it normally has those actions available and you take the proper action to command it.

Energy Adaptive.name: Energy Adaptive
Energy Adaptive.description:
A complex pattern of protective symbols gives protection against various forms of energy, but only part of the runic structure can be active at a given time.

Activate R envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage

Effect You gain resistance 5 to the triggering damage type. This doesn't apply to the triggering damage. This resistance lasts until you Activate this rune again or the armor is no longer invested by you.

Energy Mutagen (Greater).name: Energy Mutagen (Greater)
Energy Mutagen (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

When created, this mutagen is attuned to one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts.

Benefit You gain resistance 15 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add [[/r 1d6]] damage to the attuned energy type. In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy that deals [[/r 2d6]] damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Greater Energy Mutagen] save).

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.JbJykktAYMR4BRav]{Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater)}

Energy Mutagen (Lesser).name: Energy Mutagen (Lesser)
Energy Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Activate A Interact

When created, this mutagen is attuned to one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts.

Benefit You gain resistance 5 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 damage to the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Duration 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.C9Tnl6Q7Z5Sbw5EY]{Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser)}

Energy Mutagen (Major).name: Energy Mutagen (Major)
Energy Mutagen (Major).description:
Activate A Interact

When created, this mutagen is attuned to one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts.

Benefit You gain resistance 20 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add [[/r 2d6]] damage to the attuned energy type. In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy that deals [[/r 3d6]] damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save).

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.RIozNOntRJok5ZJt]{Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major)}

Energy Mutagen (Moderate).name: Energy Mutagen (Moderate)
Energy Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Activate A Interact

When created, this mutagen is attuned to one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts.

Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add [[/r 1d4]] damage to the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Duration 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.na2gf5mSkilFoHXk]{Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate)}

Energy Robe of Acid.name: Energy Robe of Acid
Energy Robe of Acid.description:
This brightly colored linen robe is covered in delicate embroidery depicting creatures and natural phenomena suiting its aligned energy, such as a living thunderclap, pools of acid, roaring flames, or dancing marids. You gain resistance 5 to acid.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You speak a command word, and the embroidered threads in the robe glow vividly. You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed, as the acid on your hands grants you easier handholds.

Energy Robe of Cold.name: Energy Robe of Cold
Energy Robe of Cold.description:
This brightly colored linen robe is covered in delicate embroidery depicting creatures and natural phenomena suiting its aligned energy, such as a living thunderclap, pools of acid, roaring flames, or dancing marids. You gain resistance 5 to cold.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You speak a command word, and the embroidered threads in the robe glow vividly. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk} for 1 minute, as you momentarily flash freeze the surface of water as you walk across it.

Energy Robe of Electricity.name: Energy Robe of Electricity
Energy Robe of Electricity.description:
This brightly colored linen robe is covered in delicate embroidery depicting creatures and natural phenomena suiting its aligned energy, such as a living thunderclap, pools of acid, roaring flames, or dancing marids. You gain resistance 5 to electricity.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You speak a command word, and the embroidered threads in the robe glow vividly. You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.c0URo81HpSmCkuQc]{Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity}

Energy Robe of Fire.name: Energy Robe of Fire
Energy Robe of Fire.description:
This brightly colored linen robe is covered in delicate embroidery depicting creatures and natural phenomena suiting its aligned energy, such as a living thunderclap, pools of acid, roaring flames, or dancing marids. You gain resistance 5 to fire.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You speak a command word, and the embroidered threads in the robe glow vividly. You gain a +30-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute as flames shoot out behind you to speed you up.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.6alqXfVq0qWQC359]{Effect: Energy Robe of Fire}

Energy-Absorbing.name: Energy-Absorbing
Energy-Absorbing.description:
As with energy-resistant runes, these runes convey protective forces from the Elemental Planes. You gain 5 resistance to acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The crafter chooses the damage type when creating the rune. Multiple energy-absorbing runes can be etched onto a suit of armor; rather than using only the highest-level effect, each must provide resistance to a different type. When an energy-absorbing rune provides resistance to damage from a foe's attack or ability, the armor itself appears to become infused with that energy, be it dripping with acid, riming over in frost, crackling with lightning, or flickering with flames. This effect does not inflict damage itself and ends at the start of your next turn, or as soon as you take the following reaction.

Activate r envision

Trigger Your armor is infused with energy and you take damage from a melee Strike

Effect You unleash the infused energy against the triggering melee Strike, inflicting 2d6 damage of that energy type to the creature who made the melee Strike.

Energy-Absorbing (Greater).name: Energy-Absorbing (Greater)
Energy-Absorbing (Greater).description:
As with energy-resistant runes, these runes convey protective forces from the Elemental Planes. You gain 10 resistance to acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The crafter chooses the damage type when creating the rune. Multiple energy-absorbing runes can be etched onto a suit of armor; rather than using only the highest-level effect, each must provide resistance to a different type. When an energy-absorbing rune provides resistance to damage from a foe's attack or ability, the armor itself appears to become infused with that energy, be it dripping with acid, riming over in frost, crackling with lightning, or flickering with flames. This effect does not inflict damage itself and ends at the start of your next turn, or as soon as you take the following reaction.

Activate r envision

Trigger Your armor is infused with energy and you take damage from a melee Strike

Effect You unleash the infused energy against the triggering melee Strike, inflicting 4d6 damage of that energy type to the creature who made the melee Strike.

Energy-Resistant.name: Energy-Resistant
Energy-Resistant.description: These symbols convey protective forces from the Elemental Planes. You gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The crafter chooses the damage type when creating the rune. Multiple energy-resistant runes can be etched onto a suit of armor; rather than using only the highest-level effect, each must provide resistance to a different damage type. For instance, a +2 acid-resistant greater fire-resistant breastplate would give you acid resistance 5 and fire resistance 10.

Energy-Resistant (Greater).name: Energy-Resistant (Greater)
Energy-Resistant (Greater).description: These symbols convey protective forces from the Elemental Planes. You gain resistance 10 to acid, cold, electricity, or fire. The crafter chooses the damage type when creating the rune. Multiple energy-resistant runes can be etched onto a suit of armor; rather than using only the highest-level effect, each must provide resistance to a different damage type. For instance, a +2 acid-resistant greater fire-resistant breastplate would give you acid resistance 5 and fire resistance 10.

Enfilading Arrow.name: Enfilading Arrow
Enfilading Arrow.description:
Ammunition Arrow

Activate 1 Interact

This arrow splits at the far end of the shaft into five branching arrowheads, making it impractical for single targets but deadly in combat. When you fire an activated enfilading arrow, it sails upward and shatters into countless copies. The arrows then rain down in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] at any point within your weapon's first range increment, dealing [[/r 6d8[piercing]]] damage to all creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|traits:ammunition|showDC:all]).

If a creature critically fails the save and you have access to the bow critical specialization effect, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and must spend an Interact action to attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:10|name:Pull Free of Pinning Arrow|traits:ammunition|showDC:all] check to pull the missile free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds.

Engulfing Snare.name: Engulfing Snare
Engulfing Snare.description:
You arrange a spiky cage of bones, particularly tough vegetation, or other material to spring up when disturbed. The snare deals [[/r 9d8[piercing]]] damage to the first creature to enter this square; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is knocked aside by the snare's deployment, taking half damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature is captured by the cage, taking full damage and falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} while it remains within the cage. It can get free by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} (DC 31) or by destroying the cage (Hardness 5, HP 30, object immunities).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes double damage.

Enhanced Hearing Aids.name: Enhanced Hearing Aids
Enhanced Hearing Aids.description:
These hearing aids work like magical hearing aids, but they're designed with a more potent and focused magic.

Activate f envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements Your hearing aids are currently on

Effect You mentally increase the input of your hearing aids. You gain a +1 item bonus to all hearing-based Perception checks for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.T27uDXdMVc5ZFwKw]{Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids}

Enigma Mirror.name: Enigma Mirror
Enigma Mirror.description:
Mist fills the glass of this small circular hand mirror, creating strange patterns in the shifting gray wisps. The back of the mirror bears a flowing script engraving in an unknown language. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 23.

  • Armor After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally gains a single illusory image, per mirror image. The image lasts until the end of your next turn if not destroyed before then.
  • Weapon After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, illusory copies of the weapon swirl in the air around it. You're affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.X56VdA98VedAfGTU]{Thicket of Knives} spell until the end of your next turn. The spell ends if you stop wielding the affixed weapon.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}

Enigma Mirror (Greater).name: Enigma Mirror (Greater)
Enigma Mirror (Greater).description:
Mist fills the glass of this small circular hand mirror, creating strange patterns in the shifting gray wisps. The back of the mirror bears a flowing script engraving in an unknown language. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 27.

  • Armor After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally gains a single illusory image, per mirror image. The image lasts until the end of your next turn if not destroyed before then.
  • Weapon After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, illusory copies of the weapon swirl in the air around it. You're affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.X56VdA98VedAfGTU]{Thicket of Knives} spell until the end of your next turn. The spell ends if you stop wielding the affixed weapon.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A7w3YQBrFNH8KYsB]{Mirror's Misfortune}.

Enigma Mirror (Major).name: Enigma Mirror (Major)
Enigma Mirror (Major).description:
Mist fills the glass of this small circular hand mirror, creating strange patterns in the shifting gray wisps. The back of the mirror bears a flowing script engraving in an unknown language. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 27.

  • Armor After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally gains a single illusory image, per mirror image. The image lasts until the end of your next turn if not destroyed before then.
  • Weapon After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, illusory copies of the weapon swirl in the air around it. You're affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.X56VdA98VedAfGTU]{Thicket of Knives} spell until the end of your next turn. The spell ends if you stop wielding the affixed weapon.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A7w3YQBrFNH8KYsB]{Mirror's Misfortune}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.CmZCq4htcZ6W0TKk]{Mirror Malefactors}.

Enigma-Sight Potion.name: Enigma-Sight Potion
Enigma-Sight Potion.description:
Activate 1 Interact

A vial of this enigma-sight potion seems to contain fragments of kaleidoscopic crystal that reflect mind-bending scenes. However, these "crystals" act like liquid when poured or consumed. Drinking the potion grants you the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} spell, except that you use your Perception modifier and your level for the secret counteract check instead of the normal counteract modifier and spell level. However, if you critically fail the secret counteract check the effect grants, your mind fills in false, nightmarish information. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as your brain struggles to process what you see.

Enormous chryselephantine sculpture by a.name: Enormous chryselephantine sculpture by a legend

Enormous tapestry of a major battle.name: Enormous tapestry of a major battle

Ensnaring Disk.name: Ensnaring Disk
Ensnaring Disk.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You use the affixed shield to Shield Block a melee weapon attack

Requirements You are an expert in Athletics.

This coin-sized metal disk is inscribed with arcane symbols and mounted on the inner surface of a shield. When you Activate the disk, the triggering weapon momentarily sticks to your shield, allowing you to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} it from its wielder with a +2 item bonus. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead.

Entertainer's Lute.name: Entertainer's Lute
Entertainer's Lute.description:
This lustrous lute has a polished body that changes to show whatever decorations or carvings you find most appealing, or which best reinforce the story of the song you're currently playing (as a free action). Its frets are inlaid with mother of pearl. With its mix of enchantment and illusion magic, it's favored by many traveling minstrels. While playing the lute, you gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VACvA5VRbddjt5s9]{Infectious Enthusiasm}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Entertainer's Lute (Greater).name: Entertainer's Lute (Greater)
Entertainer's Lute (Greater).description:
This lustrous lute has a polished body that changes to show whatever decorations or carvings you find most appealing, or which best reinforce the story of the song you're currently playing (as a free action). Its frets are inlaid with mother of pearl. With its mix of enchantment and illusion magic, it's favored by many traveling minstrels. While playing the lute, you gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VACvA5VRbddjt5s9]{Infectious Enthusiasm}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Entertainer's Lute (Major).name: Entertainer's Lute (Major)
Entertainer's Lute (Major).description:
This lustrous lute has a polished body that changes to show whatever decorations or carvings you find most appealing, or which best reinforce the story of the song you're currently playing (as a free action). Its frets are inlaid with mother of pearl. With its mix of enchantment and illusion magic, it's favored by many traveling minstrels. While playing the lute, you gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy and Performance checks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VACvA5VRbddjt5s9]{Infectious Enthusiasm}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{Enthrall}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{Glibness}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Enveloping Light.name: Enveloping Light
Enveloping Light.description:
This tattoo is a series of six concentric circles that show up as a soft yellow on any skin tone. The marks carry in them a protective force that bolsters your body and soul. The first time each day that someone attempts to Treat your Wounds and rolls a critical failure, they get a failure instead.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect For 5 rounds, your entire body begins to glow, with the effects of a 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell. At the end of each of your turns during this time, you regain [[/r 1d4[healing]]]{1d4 Hit Points}.

Enveloping Light (Greater).name: Enveloping Light (Greater)
Enveloping Light (Greater).description:
This tattoo is a series of six concentric circles that show up as a soft yellow on any skin tone. The marks carry in them a protective force that bolsters your body and soul. Any time someone rolls a critical failure to Treat your Wounds, they get a failure instead.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect For 5 rounds, your entire body begins to glow, with the effects of a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell. At the end of each of your turns during this time, you regain [[/r 2d8[healing]]]{2d8 Hit Points}.

Envenomed Snare.name: Envenomed Snare
Envenomed Snare.description:
This snare is coated with giant wasp venom and tipped with needles, which deliver the venom to the first creature to enter the square. That creature takes [[/r 4d6[piercing]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true|showDC:all]) and, on a failure, the creature is exposed to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.aBOPYlfHAcXUmhF7]{Giant Wasp Venom}.

Craft Requirements Supply 2 doses of giant wasp venom.

Envisioning Mask.name: Envisioning Mask
Envisioning Mask.description:
These strange masks consist of a thin stone hood and a shimmering purple veil reminiscent of the pleroma aeon who first gifted them to mortals in the hope that sharing the means of aeon communication would reduce the misunderstandings and conflicts among mortal civilizations. An envisioning mask covers your entire face, though it doesn't hinder your vision or other senses.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You lose the ability to produce language and instead communicate wordlessly through a series of psychic projections. This acts as telepathy with a range of 100 feet, but it is understandable to all creatures regardless of whether they have a language. When communicating with non-aeons, however, your meaning is often vague and mysterious. This effect lasts for 10 minutes.

Eroding Bullet.name: Eroding Bullet
Eroding Bullet.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

Eroding bullets cast a faint green glow, and smell like the sickly- sweet organic gases that rise from corpses. Handling an eroding bullet without gloves deals [[/r 1[acid]]] damage and leaves the putrid scent coated on your fingers. Upon Striking an enemy, the glass casing inside the bullet bursts, releasing a splattering of bubbling green acid that coats the target. The target takes [[/r 2d6[persistent,acid]]] damage in addition to the damage normally dealt by the attack.

Erraticannon.name: Erraticannon
Erraticannon.description:
This +1 striking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.4LJEpZ2HkCu9BvHI]{Hand Cannon} is festooned with so many add-ons and modifications it's barely recognizable as a firearm. A large hopper at the top of the gun allows any type of ammunition (including arrows, bolts, stone bullets, and firearm rounds) to be fed into the machine, which converts the ammunition into blasts of raw, destructive energy. Each time you attack with the weapon, roll [[/r 1d8]] to determine the damage type of the Strike—all of the erraticannon's weapon damage is converted to that damage type for the Strike. Additionally, roll another d8, and the erraticannon deals [[/r 1d6]] additional damage of this second damage type.

d8 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Electricity
4 Fire
5 Sonic
6 Bludgeoning
7 Piercing
8 Slashing

Activate2

Frequency once per day

Effect You set the erraticannon to maximum power and unleash a blast that deals [[/r {1d6[acid],1d6[cold],1d6[electricity],1d6[fire],1d6[sonic],1d6[bludgeoning],1d6[piercing],1d6[slashing]}]]{1d6 acid, 1d6 cold, 1d6 electricity, 1d6 fire, 1d6 sonic, 1d6 bludgeoning, 1d6 piercing, and 1d6 slashing} damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true] save).

Escape Fulu.name: Escape Fulu
Escape Fulu.description:
Activate 1 envision

Trigger You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

The escape fulu is a charm common among wealthy people, who wear the talisman in case of kidnapping. When you Activate this fulu, for 1 minute, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attempts to Escape as well as to Stealth checks to Hide and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Essence Prism.name: Essence Prism
Essence Prism.description:
This enormous, multifaceted prism normally rests on a pedestal, eerily refracting many-colored lights even when no light source is present. In reality, the prism refracts the four magical essences into the visible spectrum. A creature adjacent to the prism can adjust its facets with an Interact action to change between two polarities. Two essences flow from two input streams into the prism, where the prism combines them into a single output stream; alternatively, a single essence flows from one input stream into the prism and is split into two output streams. A creature that enters and stays within an input essence stream for 1 minute is slowly encased in solid magic, at which point it is paralyzed until anyone reverses the prism's flow or finishes activating the prism. A creature stepping into an output essence stream is gently pushed back and out of the stream.

Activate D Interact

Effect You alter and rearrange the facets of the essence prism, adjusting the essences to select for a single quality, which might be associated with mental essence, like a personality trait; material essence, like a physical quality; vital essence, like a belief or instinct; or spiritual essence, like an alignment component such as good or lawful. You must succeed at a secret DC 30 skill check with a skill associated with a magical tradition that uses the essence you chose (for instance, Arcana or Occultism for mental essence, as arcane and occult magic both use mental essence). On a failure, you accidentally set the prism for some other quality.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Requirements The prism has only one input stream, and a creature is encased in magic in the input stream

Effect Over the course of the next hour, the creature in the input stream has its essences refracted through the prism, creating two cocoons of magic in the output streams that each contain a new creature. At the end of the process, the original creature is gone, and the two new creatures break free of their cocoons. Each creature is part of the original, separated from the rest based on the last quality set by the prism's first activation. For instance, if you set the prism to "good", one creature would have all the original creature's good aspects and the other would be the original creature's evil side. Unless you selected a physical quality, both new creatures look just like the original. The new creatures are usually 2 levels lower than the original, but if the original creature was strongly biased with respect to the quality you chose (for instance, if splitting out the good and evil side of a redeemer), the stronger creature is 1 level lower and the weaker creature is 3 or more levels lower. If calibrated correctly, this activation can also reverse the effect of the third activation.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Requirements The prism has two input streams, and a creature is encased in magic in each of the input streams

Effect Over the course of the next hour, the essences of both creatures in the input streams are refracted through the prism, creating a cocoon of magic in the output stream that contains a new creature. At the end of the process, the original creatures are gone, and the new creature breaks free of its cocoon. The new creature is an amalgam of the originals, with a new personality blended from both, and is usually 1 or 2 levels higher than the higher level of the original creatures unless the lower-level creature was much weaker. This activation also reverses the effect of the second activation.

Destruction Forcing the essence prism to combine two incompatible demigods destroys the prism, though it might also result in a new divinity.

Ethereal.name: Ethereal
Ethereal.description:
An ethereal rune replicates armor on the Ethereal Plane.

Activate A command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} spell. This doesn't require concentration and lasts for 10 minutes or until you choose to return to material form as a free action.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of 9th level ethereal jaunt.

Etheric Essence Disruptor (Greater).name: Etheric Essence Disruptor (Greater)
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Greater).description:
Actived Interact

An etheric essence disruptor emits bursts of discordant ethereal energy through a process based upon Stasian etheric-spirit singers, though without the need for a Stasian coil. Etheric essence disruptors attempt to break down the workings of a spell that manipulates spiritual essence. Upon activation, attempt to counteract an active divine or occult spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 60 feet, the counteract modifier is +18 [[/r d20+18]], and the counteract level is 6.

Etheric Essence Disruptor (Lesser).name: Etheric Essence Disruptor (Lesser)
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Lesser).description:
Actived Interact

An etheric essence disruptor emits bursts of discordant ethereal energy through a process based upon Stasian etheric-spirit singers, though without the need for a Stasian coil. Etheric essence disruptors attempt to break down the workings of a spell that manipulates spiritual essence. Upon activation, attempt to counteract an active divine or occult spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 30 feet, the counteract modifier is +7 [[/r d20+7]], and the counteract level is 2.

Etheric Essence Disruptor (Major).name: Etheric Essence Disruptor (Major)
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Major).description:
Actived Interact

An etheric essence disruptor emits bursts of discordant ethereal energy through a process based upon Stasian etheric-spirit singers, though without the need for a Stasian coil. Etheric essence disruptors attempt to break down the workings of a spell that manipulates spiritual essence. Upon activation, attempt to counteract an active divine or occult spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 90 feet, the counteract modifier is +24 [[/r d20+24]], and the counteract level is 8.

Etheric Essence Disruptor (Moderate).name: Etheric Essence Disruptor (Moderate)
Etheric Essence Disruptor (Moderate).description:
Actived Interact

An etheric essence disruptor emits bursts of discordant ethereal energy through a process based upon Stasian etheric-spirit singers, though without the need for a Stasian coil. Etheric essence disruptors attempt to break down the workings of a spell that manipulates spiritual essence. Upon activation, attempt to counteract an active divine or occult spell within the listed range, with the listed counteract modifier and counteract level.

The range is 40 feet, the counteract modifier is +13 [[/r d20+13]], and the counteract level is 4.

Ethersight Ring.name: Ethersight Ring
Ethersight Ring.description: An ethersight ring is a glass band containing a swirling cloud of gray smoke. When you invest the ring, the smoke becomes as transparent as the glass encapsulating it, and you can see clearly into the Ethereal Plane with a range of 60 feet. Whether or not you have invested the ring, you are also visible to creatures in the Ethereal Plane within the same range while wearing it. Although you can see these creatures and they can see you, you can only affect each other with abilities that cross between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane.

Euphoric Loop.name: Euphoric Loop
Euphoric Loop.description:
Activate Cast a Spell

This catalyst is made from twisted sapling bark harvested under a full moon. When used to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell, the enchantment creates a blissful experience for one target of your choice. When the spell ends, even if you Dismiss it, the sudden mental dissonance between the charmed state and reality forces the target to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, confused for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, confused for 2 rounds.

Euphoric Loop (Greater).name: Euphoric Loop (Greater)
Euphoric Loop (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell

This catalyst is made from twisted sapling bark harvested under a full moon. When used to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell, the enchantment creates a blissful experience for all targets of the charm spell, up to 10. When the spell ends, even if you Dismiss it, the sudden mental dissonance between the charmed state and reality forces the target to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, confused for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} or, if the spell ended because of a hostile action, confused for 2 rounds.

Everburning Torch.name: Everburning Torch
Everburning Torch.description: An everburning torch is one of the most common applications of permanent magic. This torch sheds light constantly, requiring no oxygen and generating no heat. The flame can be covered or hidden, but can't be smothered or quenched.

Everyneed Pack.name: Everyneed Pack
Everyneed Pack.description:
Constructed of green material and decorated with a white Glyph of the Open Road, has a dozen or more small pockets lining the inside. The pack is enchanted so that each pocket contains common, mundane gear, each item worth no more than 1 gp, such as chalk, flint and steel, and string. It doesn't contain any armor, shields, weapons, or items made of any kind of precious material. Keep track of the exact value of the gear you retrieve from the pack. The pack becomes a mundane backpack after items of your choice with a combined value of 8 gp have been removed from it.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You draw any number of pieces of mundane gear from the pack with a combined value of 1 gp or less.

Everyneed Pack (Greater).name: Everyneed Pack (Greater)
Everyneed Pack (Greater).description:
Constructed of green material and decorated with a white Glyph of the Open Road, has a dozen or more small pockets lining the inside. The pack is enchanted so that each pocket contains common, mundane gear, each item worth no more than 5 gp, such as chalk, flint and steel, and string. It doesn't contain any armor, shields, weapons, or items made of any kind of precious material. Keep track of the exact value of the gear you retrieve from the pack. The pack becomes a mundane backpack after items of your choice with a combined value of 45 gp have been removed from it.

Activate 1 minute (Interact)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You draw any number of pieces of mundane gear from the pack with a combined value of 5 gp or less.

Experimental Clothing.name: Experimental Clothing
Experimental Clothing.description:
Experimental clothing is custom tailored in radical, avant‑garde styles by independent dressmakers, utilizing expensive or eccentric materials and unconventional patterns.

At the GM's discretion, wearing experimental clothing may impart a +1 item bonus or -1 item penalty on checks to Make An Impression, depending on the target's fashion sense.

Exploding Shield.name: Exploding Shield
Exploding Shield.description:
The magic within this wooden shield (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6) lashes out at your foes as the shield is destroyed.

Activate F Interact

Trigger The exploding shield is destroyed

Effect The shield explodes outward, dealing 4d6 piercing damage to each creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]).

Hardness HP BT
3 12 6

Exploration Lens (Detecting).name: Exploration Lens (Detecting)
Exploration Lens (Detecting).description:
Activate1 Interact

An exploration lens is a magical glass lens designed for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QrNvP9SgnK9DrerA]{Bull's Eye Lantern}. When light from the lantern passes through the lens, it alters the light to make it easier to perform a common exploration activity with the lantern.

Alternatively, an exploration lens can be installed in a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} like an aeon stone. In this case, light (such as that from a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.dIRZ0LL7G31fJNYz]{Lantern (Hooded)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8Jdw4yAzWYylGePS]{Torch}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell) must still pass through the lens and you must hold the wayfinder in your hand for it to function.

There are several different types of exploration lens, each granting benefits with a different type of exploration activity. Each type of lens is distinguishable from all the other types by holding it up to a bright light.

Type: Detecting

When held up to light, this lens sparkles as though infused with glitter.

While @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{Detecting Magic} in exploration mode, when the lantern's light falls upon something you detect as magical, it pulsates faintly. This makes it easier to triangulate the magic, since you can use the cone of the bull's-eye lantern instead of the circular pulse of detect magic.

You also gain a +2 item bonus to checks to Identify Magic within the light.

Exploration Lens (Investigating).name: Exploration Lens (Investigating)
Exploration Lens (Investigating).description:
Activate1 Interact

An exploration lens is a magical glass lens designed for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QrNvP9SgnK9DrerA]{Bull's Eye Lantern}. When light from the lantern passes through the lens, it alters the light to make it easier to perform a common exploration activity with the lantern.

Alternatively, an exploration lens can be installed in a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} like an aeon stone. In this case, light (such as that from a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.dIRZ0LL7G31fJNYz]{Lantern (Hooded)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8Jdw4yAzWYylGePS]{Torch}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell) must still pass through the lens and you must hold the wayfinder in your hand for it to function.

There are several different types of exploration lens, each granting benefits with a different type of exploration activity. Each type of lens is distinguishable from all the other types by holding it up to a bright light.

Type: Investigating

The outer rim of this lens glows faintly when held up to the light.

While activated, the lens grants you a +1 item bonus to skill checks to Recall Knowledge while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EwgTZBWsc8qKaViP]{Investigating} by outlining potential clues in a way that triggers your memory.

If you're Investigating something while using the lens, you can always roll a Recall Knowledge skill check appropriate to the investigation for initiative.

Exploration Lens (Searching).name: Exploration Lens (Searching)
Exploration Lens (Searching).description:
Activate1 Interact

An exploration lens is a magical glass lens designed for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.QrNvP9SgnK9DrerA]{Bull's Eye Lantern}. When light from the lantern passes through the lens, it alters the light to make it easier to perform a common exploration activity with the lantern.
